feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS/GRA][Managed Services] - Logs Data Platform maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 17, 12:00 - 16:00 UTC

Jul 18, 19:03 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our Logs Data Platform offering.

Start time : 17/09/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 17/09/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : The public API of Logs Data Platform product will be on read only mode during the whole maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on Logs Data Platform offering.
For more information about IAM for Logs Data Platform, you can visit this documentation: KB0071667

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX/SBG][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 26, 04:30 - 09:00 UTC

Aug 5, 11:41 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare Metal Cloud offer.

Start time : 26/08/2025 04:30 UTC
End time : 26/08/2025 09:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [Global][Virtual Private Servers] - Images EoL notification
entry.content:
Aug 4, 21:14 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jul 4, 09:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jul 3, 13:05 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Virtual Private Servers offer.

Start time : 04/07/2025 09:00 UTC
End time : 04/08/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : Below-mentioned images will no longer be available to purchase or use.

Several images currently offered as part of our VPS offering have reached, or are approaching, End of Life (EoL). As of August 4th, 2025, these images will be officially removed from our VPS catalog in accordance with our End of Life policy. You can read more about our distribution End of Life policy here : https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-vps-image-life-cycle?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0050801

Below is the complete list of images, as well our recommendations and alternatives for VPS environments.
EoL DistributionEoL / EoS dateAlternative DistributionRecommended action
Centos 730/06/2024AlmaLinux/ Rocky LinuxBackup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 3705/12/2023Fedora 42Backup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 3821/05/2024Fedora 42Backup and upgrade distribution

If you use automation to deploy your infrastructure with any of these images, we strongly recommend that you either switch to another distribution or upload your own image to use instead. You can refer to the following guides to :
Upgrade operating system: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-upgrade-operating-system?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0051306
Upload your image: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-upload-own-image?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0051319

Service improvement : As part of our End of Life policy, the above-mentioned images will no longer be available for purchase or reinstallation in our VPS offering.

For any question, please reach out to our support team.
Thank you for your understanding.
